dcterms:creator: wwPDB consortium
dcterms:description: The Protein Data Bank (PDB) is a global archive for the collection of 3D structural data of biological macromolecules, including proteins and nucleic acids.
dcterms:title: PDB (Protein Data Bank)

dcterms:creator: M. Tagari
R. Newman
M. Chagoyen
J. M. Carazo
K. Henrick
dcterms:description: The Electron Microscopy Data Bank (EMDB) archives processed experimental data from various 3D electron microscopy modalities, including single-particle analysis.
dcterms:title: EMDB (Electron Microscopy Data Bank)

dcterms:creator: A. Iudin
P. K. Korir
J. Salavert-Torres
G. J. Kleywegt
A. Patwardhan
dcterms:description: The Electron Microscopy Public Image Archive (EMPIAR) provides access to raw 2D image data that underpins 3D electron microscopy volumes.
dcterms:title: EMPIAR (Electron Microscopy Public Image Archive)

dcterms:creator: R. Henderson
A. Sali

dcterms:description: The Electron Microscopy Data Resource (EMDR) was a collaborative project that supported the archiving and validation of electron microscopy data.
dcterms:title: EMDR (Electron Microscopy Data Resource)

dcterms:creator: R. Henderson
J. M. Baldwin
T. A. Ceska
F. Zemlin
E. Beckmann
K. H. Downing
dcterms:description: The Electron Microscopy Validation Task Force (EM VTF) focuses on the validation of electron microscopy data and models.
dcterms:title: EM VTF (Electron Microscopy Validation Task Force)

dcterms:creator: S. Gore
S. Velankar
G. J. Kleywegt
dcterms:description: The Rotationally-Averaged Power Spectrum (RAPS) is a method used to analyze the spatial frequency content of electron microscopy maps.
dcterms:title: RAPS (Rotationally-Averaged Power Spectrum)

dcterms:creator: A. T. Brünger
dcterms:description: The Fourier-Shell Correlation (FSC) is a method used to assess the resolution of 3D reconstructions from electron microscopy data.
dcterms:title: FSC (Fourier-Shell Correlation)

dcterms:creator: C. L. Lawson
H. M. Berman
W. Chiu
dcterms:description: The EM Validation Network is a collaborative effort to improve validation practices in electron microscopy.
dcterms:title: EM Validation Network

dcterms:creator: A. Kucukelbir
F. J. Sigworth
H. D. Tagare
dcterms:description: Local Resolution Maps provide information on the resolution of different regions within a 3D reconstruction.
dcterms:title: Local Resolution Maps

dcterms:creator: Z. Wang
A. Patwardhan
G. J. Kleywegt
dcterms:description: Half-Dataset Reconstruction Volumes are used to evaluate the resolution of 3D reconstructions in electron microscopy.
dcterms:title: Half-Dataset Reconstruction Volumes
